texts.text: The cat on the mat is glad.
The happy cat wags his tail.
The cat ran. The cat is not happy.
The cat is sad and not happy.
The cat is glad to eat the yam.
The glad cat is happy.
The cat is glad to eat the jam.
The cat is fat and happy.
The cat likes the mat.
Happy cat naps on the mat.
The cat likes to nap.
The fat cat stands up after taking a nap.
The fat cat in a jam is not happy.
Sam the man is happy.
See Sam the man wave. Sam is happy.
Sams hat makes him happy.
The fat cat in a jam is not happy.
Sam the man ran. He ran fast.
Sam slams. He is not glad he ran.
The happy cat pats Sam the man.
